name: DailyAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, ask daily affirmations to give me an affirmation”
”Alexa, ask daily affirmations for a affirmation”
”Alexa, ask daily affirmations to tell me an affirmation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily affirmations
des: Some days can be harder than others. Daily Affirmations is your daily dose of positivity delivered by Alexa. Elevate your spirits and boost your confidence with a treasure trove of empowering affirmations. This skill is your go-to source for daily affirmations, motivating quotes, and messages of self-belief. Start each day on a positive note and watch your confidence soar. With daily affirmations, you'll have a constant companion in your journey to a more confident and optimistic you. Harness the power of affirmations and transform your mindset effortlessly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
